website_summaries.verdict: Top of the line security at a reasonable price makes the AKM Heavy-Duty U Lock one of the best offerings on the market.
pros: The multi-function expandable locking area makes this lock useful for so much more than just bicycles
Motorcycles, baby carriages, and a host of other items can fit within the specs of this solid and secure lock
cons: Some people find that the key mechanism is difficult to operate at any angle other than straight forward

customer_reviews.title: Easily broken
customer_reviews.text: Someone was able to pull the lock apart and stole my bike! I came back and the U shaped metal was just sitting on the ground with the bike and the locking mechanism nowhere in sight. I only had it about two weeks before this happened. It was pretty devastating. **Update: I'm revising my rating from 1 star to 4 stars due to great customer service. I was contacted and offered a full refund, which doesn't begin to cover my bike, but it's a great gesture and I really appreciate the kindness. Looking back on it, it was a very convenient lock to use, it just didn't actually stop my bike from being stolen.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: My bike was stolen within 2 weeks of purchasing this ...
customer_reviews.text: My bike was stolen within 2 weeks of purchasing this. The cord was cut so fast. The guys left off with my bike, in front of a popular gym. I was away for 1 hour and it was gone. The guys must have stolen it fast enough to not alert anyone walking in. They just left my cut cord on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Ignacio Faira

customer_reviews.title: Practical lock
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Fits on my cruiser on racks and around the diameter of street signs. Comes with everything as pictured. Very easy to lock and unlock
customer_reviews.author: Buyazon

customer_reviews.title: Usable, works, but small.
customer_reviews.text: Please note, this is a rather small lock...good for a kids bike or a thin frame, not for thick heavy framed bikes. Value is as expected for its price, not great, but usable at college to keep bike from being stolen.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M. Decker

customer_reviews.title: The u lock and cable feel very good quality. Now I will feel safe leaving my ...
customer_reviews.text: The u lock and cable feel very good quality. Now I will feel safe leaving my bike outsied of my work. Will get another for my 2nd bike.
customer_reviews.author: TOFU_91

customer_reviews.title: The lock is very sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: I bought this AKM bike lock about one month ago. The lock is very sturdy and well made. AKM makes great products and very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: The quality on the lock in the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the heavy duty u lock, because my bike was stolen. I need strong a lock. So I saw the quality on the lock and the price and Boom!! This is what I want. I like it, because It's a strong lock and is going to give hard time to break who ever tried to steal my bike. The only problem I don't realize It was too short to tie on pole. So I had to return It. So beside that is a great product to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good lock.
customer_reviews.text: While the cable is heavier than expected, I love the compact U lock and I use it everyday! A great purchase overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I think now I bought a resistant chain :) thanks
customer_reviews.author: Luciana F Marques

customer_reviews.title: Bike was Stolen first day using this lock
customer_reviews.text: If I could give zero stars I would. Second time of the first day using this lock my bike was stolen. I would like a refund for the lock and my bike if possible because this is unacceptable. If so I will consider changing my review
customer_reviews.author: Allison E.

customer_reviews.title: A little bit larger
customer_reviews.text: The lock is a little bit small but it's good
customer_reviews.author: Danny Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't even slow 'em down!
customer_reviews.text: Complete waste of time and money. Somebody cut through the cable (see picture) and now my bike is gone. But they left the lock and the cut cable. Wasn't that nice of them? Apparently they didn't need that junk lock or cable. Save you're money and don't buy this. It will only make your loss more costly.
customer_reviews.author: Saebloot

product_meta.title: AKM Bike Lock-Heavy Duty U Lock Combination Cable Lock Bicycle Lock Security for Bicycle Outdoors, 1.8 M(6-feet),Black
product_meta.description:
The AKM team specializes in making locks dedicated to providing customers with a safe, durable and convenient lock.And is committed to delivering a 5 star experience for all customers. 

AKM U lock specification: 
Color: Orange 
Weight: 725 g 
Size: 14*1800mm 

Attention: Please watch this section carefully and choose the exact option: 
In the color option, the picture shows only one cable, and the package has a 71 inch Cable + 2 velcro. 
The color option shows only one U lock, and there is a U lock + 2 keys + a lock holder inside the package. 
The color option shows U lock+cable, which contain a U lock + a 71 inch cable + 2 keys +2 Velcro+a lock holder. 

U lock features: 
1. Strong anti-theft, Cable and U-lock double protection, high safety performance. 
2. Powerful lock, wheel,frame,cushion a lock protection. Extra long cable, one lock, multiple locks, locking fixtures. 
3. Alloy steel material, effective anti smashing, anti violence open, anti hydraulic scissors, high safety factor. 
4. U lock innovative design, U lock hole position with dust-proof cover, protect the keyhole action, prevent keyhole rusty and dust access. 
5. An affordable U lock for moderate crime areas 12 mm hardened steel shackle Reinforced collar over key way for increased protection High security disc style cylinder High security Bent Foot design that are more ergonomic and reduce the amount of torque being applied, to stop them bending or breaking. 

AKM EU strive to provide exceptional products and services to customers. If any questions or good advices for our products, please feel free to contact us so that we may resolve the issue for you.
feature_bullets: SERIOUS SECURITY: The bike lock package contains a 14mm thick U lock, A lock holder and two keys. The AKM team specializes in making locks, giving you a high quality and safety lock.
STRONG: Strong locking, Alloy steel, Hardened steel and have double bow hitch in the body of the anti-theft.Resistant to cutting, breaking, sawing and shearing,high safety performance.

HIGH QUALITY: The surface of the lock is made of environmentally friendly paint to do the sheath, to protect the lock surface. It is non-toxic, odourless, and elegant, weatherproof, anti-rust, to prevent injury to the bike.
MULTI-FUNCTION: Expand the locking area,more widely used, more convenient. Applicable to bicycles, motorcycles, baby carriages,Ladder, barbecue rack,doors,Lawn mower and windows, etc.

DUST COVER AND CONVENIENT: U lock hole position with dustproof cover, protection lock hole, prevent rust and dust entry, protect and extends lock life.With A lock holder, it is more convenient to carry the lock.
